tool_description: Discover the shortest distance to the shore from any global position with our Crow Coastline Distance Calculator API
name: Crow Coastline Distance Calculator
title: Crow Coastline Distance Calculator

api_list.name: crow-two-points-distance
api_list.description: Crow-Two-Points-Distance calculates the 'crow flies distance' between two points based on their latitude and longitude coordinates. It requires source and destination coordinates with an optional distance unit parameter (default in kilometers), and returns the distance as a float.

api_list.name: crow-coastline-distance
api_list.description: Simply input your 'source_latitude' and 'source_longitude', along with your desired location precision and distance unit. The API will then provide you with the exact coordinates of the closest coastal point, as well as the distance to that location, ensuring accurate and efficient coastal proximity calculations.
